Description: On VA-173 in the County of York, in the vicinity of Brick Church Rd; Rt. 622E/W (York County);MID, motorists can expect delays due to a multi-vehicle crash. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Multi-Vehicle Crash

Description: On Rt. 629 East in the County of Brunswick, in the vicinity of Waqua Creek Rd; Rt. 630N/S (Brunswick County), motorists can expect delays due to standing water.

Description: On I-95 at mile marker 172.3 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
